name: vuejs-file-input
description: A more powerful, flexible, and completely skinnable <input type="file"> for Vue.js
author: Ray Nicholus <ray@raynicholus.com>

scripts.build-skinnable: npm run build && rm -rf dist/skinnable-file-input && mkdir dist/skinnable-file-input && cp dist/skinnableFileInput.* dist/skinnable-file-input/ && cp src/skinnable-file-input/{package.json,skinnable-file-input.vue,README.md} dist/skinnable-file-input/
